string-array.name: questions_and_answers_in_JSON_format
string-array.item: {\'answers\':[\'Confucius\',\'Lincoln\',\'Netizsche\',\'FDR\'],\'solution\':0,\'solved\':false,\'quote\':\'Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.\'}

{\'answers\': [\'Joseph Stalin\', \'Abraham Lincoln\', \'Oscar Wilde\', \'Albert Einstein\'],\'solution\': 2,\'solved\': false,\'quote\': \'The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame.\'}
{\'answers\': [\'Churchill\',\'Shakespeare\',\'Clooney\',\'Emerson\'],\'solution\':0,\'solved\':false,\'quote\':\'We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.\'}
